message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this product at a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe in its immense value and am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to stay within a tighter budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the budget.  While I value your offer, the price you're suggesting doesn't reflect the true worth of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $950,000 for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.
